english.segment1: Take my life, take it all. I lay it at Your throne. I am rich, satisfied, when I am Yours alone
english.segment2: I have learned to live to lose. I have found my home in You. And I count it all as lose it true. 'Cause I have learned to live to lose
english.segment3: Precious One, crucified. Died to set me free. I hold nothing back from You. Who gave it all for me
english.segment4: I have learned to live to lose. I have found my home in You. And I count it all as lose it true. 'Cause I have learned to live to lose
english.segment5: Jeus You're the One, You're the only One for me. Jeus You're the One, You're the only One for me. Jeus You're the One, You're the only One for me. Jeus You're the One, You're the only One for me
english.segment6: I have learned to live to lose. I have found my home in You. I count it all as lose it true. I have learned to live. Yes I have learned to live to lose. I have learned to live to lose
